metadata.title: CVE-2018-1000037 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: In MuPDF 1.12.0 and earlier, multiple reachable assertions in the PDFparser allow an attacker to cause a denial of service (assert crash) via acrafted file.

criterions.comment: mupdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
